documents.title: Assessment Overview
documents.content: Cloudora assessments include MCQs, roleplay simulations, and practical tasks. Genie conducts training tests automatically and tracks progress.

documents.title: Sample MCQ Questions
documents.content: Examples: 1) What is CRM used for? A) Sales B) Lead tracking C) Timepass D) None. Correct: B. 2) Which tone is correct with customers? A) Rude B) Neutral-professional C) Angry D) Overfriendly → B.

documents.title: Roleplay Scenarios
documents.content: Roleplay examples: 1) Customer unsure about budget — reply politely. 2) Angry customer — calm and structured response. 3) Sales objection handling. Genie evaluates tone, clarity, and structure.
